thread.title: Some of LA’s Best Chefs Come Together For an Epic Southern Feast
thread.title_full: Some of LA’s Best Chefs Come Together For an Epic Southern Feast

author: Crystal Coser
title: Some of LA’s Best Chefs Come Together For an Epic Southern Feast

organizations.name: la brea restaurant lovers of southern
uni butter  noah galuten smoked cabbage wedge
red beans  jeremy fox passmore ranch catfish étouffée  ari kolender skillet cornbread

text:
Kevin Bludso will host the January 31 dinner at his La Brea restaurant
Lovers of Southern food, rejoice! Kevin Bludso of Bludso’s Bar & Que on La Brea is hosting what they call an “All-Star Southern Dinner” on Tuesday, January 31. The $45 prix-fixe menu will feature dishes by the Texas pitmaster himself, Rustic Canyon’s Jeremy Fox, pie maven Nicole Rucker, former executive chef Charleston’s Leon's Oyster Shop’s Ari Kolender, and Bludso’s own Noah Galuten. 
Do you want to get some friends together over smothered oxtails and skillet cornbread with uni butter? Yes, you probably do. Check out the full menu below, as supplied by the restaurant.
Reservations can be made at (323) 931-2583 or info@barandque.com .
Kevin Bludso
Smothered Oxtails with Red Beans 
Jeremy Fox
Passmore Ranch Catfish Étouffée 
Ari Kolender
Skillet Cornbread with Uni Butter 
Noah Galuten
Smoked Cabbage Wedge with Warm Bacon Vinaigrette 
Nicole Rucker
Something as yet undecided but undoubtedly delicious. There will also, surely, be a dessert.
